hi Roger,

the latest versions of Heritrix deliver warc output
in format: "WARC File Format 1.0" which conforms to
the ISO 28500 specification, an ISO standard approved
in May 2009 based on the latest draft of the WARC spec.
available as a PDF file at:

http://bibnum.bnf.fr/WARC/WARC_ISO_28500_version1_latestdraft.pdf

see also:

The WARC File Format (ISO 28500) - Information, Maintenance, Drafts
http://bibnum.bnf.fr/WARC/

ISO 28500:2009
http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_catalogue/catalogue_tc/catalogue_detail.htm?csnumber=44717


hope that helps.


/steve@...


On 10/27/09 8:50 AM, Coram, Roger wrote:
>  
> 
> Hi,
> Is there any documentation on the Heritrix implementation of WARC beyond
> just the source code? i.e. elements from the specification in-/excluded,
> which version it currently adheres to, etc.
> 
> Thanks.
